*/

#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string>
#include<cctype>
#include<sstream>
#include<cmath>
#include<list>
#include<stack>
#include<map>
#include<bitset>
#include<set>
#include<cstring>
#define MAX 10000010
#define MOD 10007
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
int primes[MAX],ans[MAX];
int main()
{
    int i,j,k,n,m,t;
    for(i=0;i<=MAX;i++)primes[i]=1;
    ans[0]=0;ans[1]=0;
    int val=1;
    for(i=2;i<=MAX;i++)
    {
       if(primes[i]==1)
       {
       if(i<=3163)
       {
       for(j=i*i;j<=MAX;j+=i)primes[j]=0;
       }
       if(i>2)val=(val*2)%MOD;
       }
       ans[i]=val;
    }
    while(scanf("%d",&n)!=EOF)printf("%d\n",ans[n]);
    return 0;
}
